index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services, Office of Refugee and Immigrant Assistance, for financial assistance for the operation of naturalization programs for new immigrants; creating and authorizing the filling of certain positions, increasing expenditure allowances in the 2000 Budget of the Human Services Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Education and Civil Rights
